newsitem.title: SWEDEN: AssiDoman to build packaging plant in Poland.
newsitem.headline: AssiDoman to build packaging plant in Poland.

text.p: Swedish forestry group AssiDoman AB said on Monday it was investing 80 million crowns to build a corrugated packaging plant in Poland.
The plant would be located between Warsaw and Poznan and would produce 30 million square metres of corrugated board annually, AssiDoman said in a statement.
It would be a so-called sheet plant, meaning it would make the packaging from finished sheets of corrugated board, Assidoman said.
The company said the plant would be finished in the autumn of 1998, the same time as a new corrugated packaging plant at Zebrak in the Czech Republic was finished.
The Czech plant would supply a large portion of the corrugated sheets to the Polish plant, AssiDoman said.
